Parameters: Uri: This value must never be null.

if the last segment isn't a number
parseId(android.net.Uri).Description: Converts the last path segment to a long. This supports a common convention for content URIs where an ID is stored in the last segment.

ClassDesc: Utility methods useful for working with @B_android#net#Uri_E@ objects that use the "content" (content://) scheme. Content URIs have the syntax content://authority/path/id
